title: Excellent Researcher/Writer/VA For A Full-Time Position
job_overview:
I am looking for a Full-time Researcher/ Writer/ Virtual Assistant with excellent English skills. Your tasks will include, but will not be limited to the following:
*research and collating data
*creating lists and spreadsheets
*tracking reports
*updating spreadsheets and trackers
*writing scripts and captions
*responding to emails
*creating email campaigns

Pay is TBD, this will depend on your level of skill and other people who apply to the job.

Perks:
*You can work as much as you want. I will pay you a salary but if you work extra hours you will get paid.
*Flexible Vacation, If you need time off just let me know.
*Opportunity to advance/get bonuses, If you do a good job I will give you a raise and bonuses.

About Me:
I own two companies B Dancewear and Effective Ecommerce and a partner to multiple e-commerce businesses. I have been working with Virtual Assistants for over 6 years and all of my VAs have been very happy to work with me. You will be given a chance to talk with my current VA before you are hired.

To Apply for the job:
1. Change the subject line to "I Want to Work for You [Insert the name of my mom who is the co-owner of Bdancewear]"
2. At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.
3. Write out the name of one of the passion products I featured on my channel (check out my vlogs on my YouTube channel: Travis Marziani)

Make sure to follow all the steps above. Do not write more than what I have asked you above. If you do, I will ignore your response. If I will interview you, there will be a short call between us and a video will be required.

This is a great job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants who really want the job.

Thank you,
Travis Marziani
